alert.note: Alert for Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:53PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Stillwater, north central Carbon, southwestern Yellowstone and southwestern Musselshell Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 352 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles south of Roundup to 14 miles northwest of Billings West End to 12 miles northeast of Columbus. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Billings, Laurel, Lockwood, Huntley, Shepherd, Billings Heights, Worden, Billings West End, Ballantine, Molt, Silesia, Acton, Park City, Rockvale and Comanche. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Southwestern Yellowstone
